actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department; Justice Department; OMB; Environmental Protection Agency.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to amend the application of the Clean Air Act to the Northern Mariana Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to exempt the Northern Mariana Islands from the application of such Act upon a finding by the Governor of the Islands that the benefits of compliance are significantly outweighed by the costs of compliance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the application of the Clean Air Act to the Northern Mariana Islands.
